name: Metronono_qt
short_description: It's a simple metronome, for understanding bpm of a song by manual tap. It's not written well, it works but it's only a "programming toy", I'm not a real developer and I'm still learning c++/ Qt and I wanted to know how sourceforge work, seeing "from the other side of the screen" :) . Program uses Qtimers, Qtime, many signal mapping objects, a simple system bell...and a bunch of other ui controls. So...play with it :) Turn system volume down, no volume control is enabled in this release! Sound is system alert. I'm not responsible for any damage on your system, try it under your responsibility. Source code is not "evil" ( in fact is provided, there is nothing strange in it ) but I don't know what would happen using my code.
summary: Simple metronome with manual tap function
